content.p: For Postgraduate Taught degrees, tuition fees are per programme basis; for Postgraduate Research degrees, tuition fees are in per year basis. Payment instalments differ between full-time and part-time students where part-time students pay half the annual fee. Please note that the fees stated below are only applicable to all applicants who have registered for the intake year of 2024/25. For further confirmation, please refer to your offer letter for the final tuition fee. Get in touch with our friendly counsellors to find out more about UNM. Find a programme Get in touch Application guide, intake deadlines and student requirements at your fingertips. Explore a diverse range of programmes, from full-time taught degrees to research programmes. Delivering quality education to future-proof your career. General enquiries: +60 3 8924 8000 Monday - Friday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays) Programme enquiries: +60 3 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia
